183  class _OgreExport DefaultHardwareBufferManager : public HardwareBufferManager
184  {
185  public:
186  DefaultHardwareBufferManager()
187  : HardwareBufferManager(OGRE_NEW DefaultHardwareBufferManagerBase())

189 
190  }
